Just a quick question. Now that the US has turned soverenty over to the Iragis, the war is officially over. So what is the status of the hostilities there? Police action? 
 
 Hoping for an answer from someone who actually knows, rather than educated guesses.

I gon't think we have seen an official designation yet. I am expecting something a little flashier than "police action", given our facination with catch phrases. Maybe "Super Fnatastic terrorist crushing, freedom building action"

We too (in Australia) have elections this year. The Australian Labor Party (ALP) leader, Mark Latham has stated that if he wins, Australia will pull our (insignificant in terms of numbers) forces out of Iraq.
 
 Often G W Bush has cited the core of the coalition of the willing as being the USA, UK, and Oz.
 
 I have always voted for the ALP and this decision of Mark Latham has only confirmed me in this.
 
 Sorry to leave you guys to yourselves. emoticon_xgood
